social-projects.title: Hakim Hub
social-projects.content: HakimHub is a platform that provides information about healthcare facilities and healthcare professionals in Ethiopia. Hakimhub makes information about hospitals, medical laboratories, and doctors conveniently accessible to its users.

social-projects.title: Track Sym
social-projects.content: TrackSym is a non-commercial app that uses crowd-sourcing to collect and visualize the density of the relevant Covid-19 symptoms. Symptom data, aggregated by places, can help people avoid visiting areas that are heavily populated by symptomatic people.

a2sv-sessions.title: Bi-weekly contests
a2sv-sessions.content: Contests help us to get better at competitive programming and problem-solving. We use online platforms like Leetcode and Codeforces.

a2sv-sessions.title: Technical Training
a2sv-sessions.content: 6 days a week, 3 hours of lectures and practice sessions to improve technical problem-solving skills.

a2sv-sessions.title: Q&As
a2sv-sessions.content: In Q&As, we get to know engineers, founders, and entrepreneurs from top tech companies. We see that they are normal people like us and we learn the best practices.

a2sv-sessions.title: Problem Solving Sessions
a2sv-sessions.content: We solve technical problems on a whiteboard while explaining to the class. It helps to get a feel of an interview environment.

a2sv-sessions.title: Learn How to Approach Sessions
a2sv-sessions.content: Students observe how an experienced problem solver approaches a problem from understanding it to implementing a working solution.

a2sv-sessions.title: Bi-weekly 1-1s
a2sv-sessions.content: In 1:1s, we can talk about anything that matters; clearly no boundaries. The more we speak our minds without a filter, the better for the team.
